title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra: 200MP Camera + 10x Optical Zoom Just Fully Leaked
shortdescription: First real photos and full specs – this is the phone that finally destroys iPhone.
author: Tech Expert

content.content:
Ice Universe just dropped the motherlode: real photos and full specs of the Galaxy S25 Ultra. The camera system is insane:
• 200MP main sensor (new generation)
• 50MP ultrawide
• 10MP 3x periscope
• 50MP 5x periscope
• True 10x optical zoom via sensor cropping
Plus Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy, 16GB RAM standard, and a new anti-reflective coating that kills glare. Samsung is coming for Apple’s crown.
